title: Arrest made in East Westwood shooting that killed 1, injured 3
content:
CINCINNATI (AP) —
Cincinnati police say they've arrested a man in a gun battle earlier this month that left one dead and three others injured.
Police say they charged 31-year-old Anthony Rosemond Jr. with murder on Saturday.
Court records do not indicate whether he has a defense attorney. The Associated Press attempted to reach several possible relatives, and a telephone listing for Rosemond was disconnected.
Investigators say more than 20 rounds were fired Dec. 8 in front of a market on Cincinnati's west side.
Police say 24-year-old Jonathan Austin died at the scene. Three others were injured in the shooting.
Bond for Rosemond was set Monday at $500,000.
